documents.document: @THunt3434 I want to make fun of it but… yeah. It might be what saves me in the next month.

I'm at @SeaTacAirport: where it takes 40 minutes to de-ice a plane, and when the truck finally gets there no one is in the de-icing pod.

@AaronCampeau because I'll kick myself if I don't ask: are you watching the match tomorrow? I assume no because work but worth checking.
